headline: Motorola Solutions Deepens Public Safety AI Push With Assist Suites Launch
summary: Motorola Solutions (NYSE:MSI) has launched Assist Suites, an AI driven portfolio designed to support public safety agencies. The new tools provide role based intelligence for dispatchers and field officers, aiming to improve 911 call handling, incident response and report writing. Assist Suites is built to pull together and analyze information from multiple data sources to address staffing pressures and operational complexity. For investors tracking Motorola Solutions at a current share...
